name: ATTACK OF PABLO
description:
You're in an underground bunker. Pablo has been awakened. You must solve the mystery of this underground bunker and escape from Pablo!

INSTRUCTIONS:

WINDOWS: download attack_of_pablo_windows.zip, extract it, launch project_name.exe

LINUX: download attack_of_pablo_linux.zip, extract it, grant launch permissions to [ATTACK_OF_PABLO.x86_64], launch

-this is my previous project but a lot better :)
